Package com.threecubed.auber.entities

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.threecubed.auber.entities.GameEntity
      • com.threecubed.auber.entities.Player
  • public class Player
extends GameEntity
    The player entity that the user controls. Handles keyboard input, and interaction with other entities and tiles in the game world.
    Since:
    1.0
